forum.content:
We are hiring!
Our location is at Banqiao District near fuzhong mrt station (5 mins walk)
Hoping to find a part-time job or a full time job call us now!
Requirement:
1.APRC/ ARC / (ABC，留學畢業生，具備語言專業證照）
2. 3 years of teaching experience with adults
3. Native English
4. Creative, Responsible, Flexible person

My name is Kevin the head manager.
For more information please, call me
forum.title: 板橋區
